DOC.brief_title: Historical Data Analysis Hematological Remission Survival Adults With R/R Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: A retrospective observational study review historical survival data ( hematological remission survival ) adult patient either relapsed refractory B-precursor acute lymphoblastic leukemia . Data aggregate across multiple country study site EU US
DOC.criteria: adult patient relapse / refractory Bprecursor acute lymphoblastic leukemia age 15 old time de novo ( initial ) diagnosis acute lymphoblastic leukemia initial diagnosis acute lymphoblastic leukemia year 1990 later No CNS involvement relapse No isolate extramedullary relapse Other inclusion criterion may apply
